mapper.select: SELECT b.id, b.name, b.title, b.keywords, b.description, b.alt, b.describe_msg AS describeMsg, a.filename AS fileName, a.filesize AS fileSize, a.filetype AS fileType, a.filepath AS filePath, a.file_id AS fileId, a.create_time AS createTime FROM project b LEFT JOIN system_attachment a ON b.system_attachment_id=a.id WHERE b.module_id=#{moduleId} ORDER BY b.sort
